column3:
俺はこれからこいつを動かして ガノンの野郎を狙いに行くぜ

おめえがあの城で奴と戦う時 すげえ一発を撃ち込んでやる
column4:
I'm gonna take this down the mountain. I'll have a
better shot at Ganon there.And then, once you've made your way into Hyrule
Castle, we're gonna light that thing up!

column3:
忘れるなよ……

これからのおめえには俺の護りの力が共に在るって事をな
column4:
From this moment forth, the power of protection,
from the depths of my soul, now lives inside you.

column3:
じゃあ行きな相棒……

姫さんを頼んだぜ……
column4: Good luck, little guy!And give my regards to the princess.

column3:
でもよ……
ルーダニアも この通り取り戻せた
これで100年前の仕事だけは きっちり果たせそうだ
column4:
The good news is, Rudania is now back
under our control!That means that our century-old Ganon
beat-down plan can finally go into effect!

column3:
それから俺の力……
ダルケルの護りを おめえにやるよ
魂になった今の俺には もう使えねえからな

役立ててくれ！
column4:
I want to give you something. It's a special power
of mine called Daruk's Protection.It's no good to me now that I'm a spirit...
but it might be useful for you.Here it comes!

column3:
おめえのお蔭で俺の魂も解放された……

ありがとうよ
column4:
I owe you big for this. Because of you, my spirit
is finally free. Can't thank you enough!

column3:
しかし面目ねえ……

俺はハイラルを守る事も出来ずやられちまって……
column4:
I feel like I should apologize.I was doing all I could to protect Hyrule
when that thing got the best of me.

column3: あげく おめえにエライ苦労かけてよ
column4:
Sorry that me resting with the rubble
caused such a mess.
